meanings.definition: The act of deranging or the state of being deranged.
meanings.sent1: The derangement of the books on the shelf made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with a mental derangement.
meanings.sent3: The derangement of the party decorations caused a lot of confusion.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a derangement of thoughts, all jumbled up and chaotic.
meanings.sent5: The derangement of the traffic lights led to a major accident.

meanings.sent1: The derangement of the schedule caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent2: The storm left a trail of derangement in its wake.
meanings.sent3: The derangement of the puzzle pieces made it impossible to solve.
meanings.sent4: The derangement of the forest ecosystem had long-lasting effects.
meanings.sent5: The sudden derangement of the power grid left the city in darkness.
